meanings.definition: A person who trusts or has confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She is one of my closest trusters, always believing in me.
meanings.sent2: The trusters in the team have faith in our abilities to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The truster in the group always thinks I can fly if I try hard enough.
meanings.sent4: Being a truster is like having a loyal cheerleader by your side.
meanings.sent5: Her unwavering support makes her a true truster.

meanings.definition: The act of placing trust or confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: His trusters in the project helped him stay positive during tough times.
meanings.sent2: Trusters in a relationship are essential for building a strong bond.
meanings.sent3: Placing all your trusters in a leaky boat might not be the best idea.
meanings.sent4: The trusters in the plan held it together when everything seemed to fall apart.
meanings.sent5: Her trusters in fate guided her through life's uncertainties.
